title: League of Legends unplayable I get bugsplats before I can even load a match
body: Not sure if this is due to a new Windows 10 update or what but now I can't even play the game due to constant bugsplats causing me to never connect. I even got a Leaver game now in ranked because of this, what should I do?

replies.body: what drivers?  I have been having this problem for a couple of weeks now.  I have tried everything support has told me and it still doesn't  work .  I get bugsplat at the load screen every time.  I have even completely restored my computer and still nothing.  Please help me I am on the verge of going crazy!

This could be happening for a few reasons like bad files or drivers, but there's been a more pressing issue with third party programs.  If you are running any like play.tv, get rid of it as a first step and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that helps or not, and we'll go from there!

I was finally able to run a custom game after redownloading most of my drivers for my pc, unfortunately I get more ping spikes than usual but it runs.
